thread.title: Funereal For NYPD Officer Holder Next Week Wednesday
thread.title_full: Funereal For NYPD Officer Holder Next Week Wednesday

author: Mark Hirshberg
title: Funereal For NYPD Officer Holder Next Week Wednesday
text:
Share 
A funeral service for NYPD officer Randolph Holder that was murdered in the line of Duty Tuesday night in east Harlem, Manhattan will be held next week Wednesday, Oct. 28. 
There will be a public viewing on Tuesday, Oct. 27 from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. at Community Church of the Nazarene located at 1414 Central Avenue in Far Rockaway. 
The funeral service will be Wednesday, Oct. 28 3:00 p.m. at the same location. 
Jet Blue Airlines is offering free tickets for law enforcement from across the country that wish to attend the funeral. 
Officer Holderâ€™s body will be flown back to be buried in his home country of Guyana.
